getAvailableProfiles

public java.util.List<ProfileDTO> getAvailableProfiles(AbstractTarget aTarget)
Get the list of profiles that can be set. The current profile can always be set (since this is the same as not changing the profile).

Parameters:
aTarget - The target that you want to set the profile on.
Returns:
A list of ProfileDTO objects for available profiles.

getAvailableProfiles

public java.util.List<ProfileDTO> getAvailableProfiles(java.lang.Long aCurrentProfileOid)
Get the list of profiles that can be set. The current profile can always be set (since this is the same as not changing the profile).

Parameters:
aCurrentProfileOid - The OID of the current profile.
Returns:
A list of the profiles that can be set for this target.
